ygData.subject: RE: Re: bronze breast plate
ygData.msgSnippet: Get a party together and hit permafrost.  The gobs there drop medium bronze. Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
Get a party together and hit permafrost. The gobs there drop medium bronze.

Rokenn

>From: John.Curry@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: bronze breast plate
>Date: Tue, 5 Oct 1999 15:23:26 -0600
>
>Yeah.. small is a dime a dozen. I am human and need medium. Try looking
>for
>a piece of medium Bronze sometime. Not easy. Going price for bronze
>breastplate on Brell... 80-100 plat. Ouch.
>
>Sevin Tercet <Mischief>
>Minstrel of Bristlebane
>22nd Human Bard
>on Brell Serelis
>
>
